titleStmt.title: Lawes and ordinances of warre, established for the better conduct of the army, by His Excellency the Earl of Essex, Lord Generall of the forces raised by the authority of the Parliament, for the defence of King and kingdom. Together with a declaration of the Lords and Commons in Parliament, concerning the regulating of great inconveniences in His Excellencies army.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Army.
Essex, Robert Devereux, Earl of. 1591-1646.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for John Partridge, and John Rothwell,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
